story.narrative: In order to As a user I want to perform an action
story.name: searchChooseAddtoCart.story
story.scenarios: Scenario:Go to blibli homepage and Login Given open home page When I login to blibli Then I can see my name in the site Given Already Logged in When I search product 'beras' on search column And I choose product of the first column And I add the product to the bag Then I see my bag contained Given Continue to pay When insert BCA klik user id Then I see thank you page
